Deficiency Narrative: Of the two child files reviewed, one file noted the psychosocial assessment was completed by the child's parent, and the other noted the child's psychosocial assessment was completed by a CPS worker in another state.
Correction Narrative: This deficiency was clarified with the operation's administrator and director of clinical management during a call on 10/23/2020. The operation noted the document titled "psychosocial assessment" captures the elements of an admission assessment, and is not being used by the operation to comply with the requirements according to this standard. The timeframes associated with securing a psychosocial assessment was discussed, as well as how minimum standards defines the aforementioned assessment. The operation's administrator and director of clinical management will be responsible for ensuring a child's psychosocial assessment is conducted within the required timeframes, and information captured on the respective admission assessment. Additionally, the document titled "psychosocial assessment" will be amended to reflect its purpose: to obtain required pre-admission information.
